remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste as, but before the data is actually pasted.

MemberSignature.Value: public DataObjectPastingEventArgs (System.Windows.IDataObject dataObject, bool isDragDrop, string formatToApply);

Docs.param: A containing the data to be pasted.

A value indicating whether the paste is part of a drag-and-drop operation. to indicate that the paste is part of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, . If this parameter is set to , a event is fired on drop.
A string specifying the preferred data format to use for the paste operation. See the class for a set of predefined data formats.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs> object is typically created by the application that is initiating the paste operation.

Docs.exception: Raised when specifies a data format that is not present in the data object specified by .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a suggested to use for the paste operation.
Docs.value:
The currently suggested to use for the paste operation.
Getting this value returns the currently suggested for the paste operation.
Setting this value specifies a new suggested to use for the paste operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Initially this property contains a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> that is identical to that stored in the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject%2A> property. Custom pasting event handlers can specify a new suggested <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> to paste by setting this property.
A <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> stored in this property must have at least one data format, the first of which is automatically applied to the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectPastingEventArgs.FormatToApply%2A> property when this property is set.

Docs.exception: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to a data object that contains no data formats.
